sourcesContent:
import { Grid, Box, Typography, Backdrop, CircularProgress } from '@material-ui/core' import { ButtonSave, ButtonCancel, gridMessageError, EditTextBinded, BackdropLoading, gridMessageSuccess } from '../customHooks/customComponents' export const Presentational=( { dataUser, setDataUser, onChangeInput, submitForm, backList, response, loading, error, message, userDetails })=>{ return (
{BackdropLoading(loading)} { "Mantenimiento de Usuarios" } {error && {gridMessageError(error)} } {(response && response.success===false) && {gridMessageError(response.error)} } {(response && response.success===true) && {gridMessageSuccess("")} } {EditTextBinded("first_name", "Nombre", dataUser.first_name, onChangeInput, loading)} {EditTextBinded("last_name", "Apellido(s)", dataUser.last_name, onChangeInput, loading)} {EditTextBinded("email", "Email", dataUser.email, onChangeInput, loading)} {EditTextBinded("phone", "Teléfono", dataUser.phone, onChangeInput, loading)} {EditTextBinded("password", "Password", dataUser.password, onChangeInput, loading, "password")} {EditTextBinded("confirm_password", "Confirme Password", dataUser.confirm_password, onChangeInput, loading, "password")} {ButtonSave("Guardar", submitForm, loading)} {ButtonCancel("Cancelar", backList, loading)}
); };
